byline.original: By P.J. PHILIP Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: French experts locate Communist propaganda stations in Germany and East Prussia or Poland; propaganda service injects boos in records of W Churchill's s
snippet: PARIS, Feb. 2--Listeners to German radio broadcasts during the last few days were amazed to find themselves hearing the voice of Winston Churchill, First Lord of the Admiralty, coming from a German station....

headline.main: NAZIS INJECT 'BOOS' IN CHURCHILL TALK; Record of Speech, Broadcast in Germany, Said to Show Reception in Manchester UNPOPULARITY STRESSED Paris Reported to Have Proof That Communist Propaganda Station Exists in Reich

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Feb. 2--Listeners to German radio broadcasts during the last few days were amazed to find themselves hearing the voice of Winston Churchill, First Lord of the Admiralty, coming from a German station.
